alert.note: Alert for Bee; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 9:26PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern San Patricio, northeastern Jim Wells, southeastern Live Oak and southern Bee Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 926 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Argenta, or near Mathis, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mathis, Lake City, San Patricio, Sandia, Argenta, Tynan, Lakeside, Lake Corpus Christi and Pernitas Point. This includes Interstate 37 between mile markers 25 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Live Oak
